name: Golden Touch (MINI JAM 85)
description:
THANKS FOR PLAYING!

The Game was made in the spare time for Mini Jam 85 during the weekend, few hours each day of the Jam! It's a mini game for mini jam.

CONTROLS:

  • WASD TO MOVE THE KING
  • THE KING IS CURSED, IF he TOUCHES HIS SERVANTS THEY TURN TO GOLD
  • STEP ON BUTTONS TO OPEN DOORS (COLORS must match)
  • 1 MINUTE TO GET TO YOUR QUEEN AND GET TO THE EXIT

STORY:

THE GOLDEN KING WAS CURSED BY A GOD NAMED SILVER PRINCE. Now everyone he touches turns to gold. SILVER PRINCE LEFT A MESSAGE.

"ESCAPE THE CASTLE WITHIN 1 minute with YOUR QUEEN and I will lift the curse. Hahahahahahahahahaha"

NOW YOU MUST HELP THE KING ESCAPE THE CASTLE. 

HIT "RESET" in the TOP RIGHT if you get stuck

SERVANTS KNOW ABOUT THE CURSE TOO - THEY ARE IN A PANIC MODE
